Bintu's HTML Project

I'm starting this website to document my journey to learning HTML, CSS, and JavaScript!

HTML

I'll begin by sharing my knowledge of HTML. HTML is the standard markup language for documents designed to be displayed in a web browser.

Duke HTML Documentation

CSS

CSS is a style sheet language used for describing the presentation of a document written in a markup language such as HTML.

Duke CSS Documentation

JavaScript

JavaScript is a scripting language that enables you to create dynamically updating content, control multimedia, animate images, and pretty much everything else.

Duke JavaScript Documentation
